title: Hello, hello
intro: It's usually the first word you say to people, but the word 'hello' has an unusual history. And just why are greetings so important? Join Rob and Catherine in 6 Minute English as they explore the world of greetings, and say 'hello' to some useful vocabulary!
this_week_question: When did 'hello' first appear in print?
Listen to the programme to find out the answer.

vocab.desc: a kiss which does not touch the face, but goes very close
pattern of behaviour in a certain context
to greet someone loudly from a distance
